title: where am I supposed to report outside of game?
body: I have evidence of an ELO booster but I have no idea where to report this..as the only thing in support is just the explanation and no actual report link.

replies.body:
If you couldn't report them from in game, then you can always send it as a support ticket. It's literally the exact same thing to them.

I think the address is support@riotgames.com, if you want to do it directly via e-mail.
